body:
Form Builder uses both IDs and input names.

IDs: 

- are unique identifiers that Form Builder needs to recognise each item, component and page in your service
- must be unique: no 2 IDs can be the same in your service

Input names:

- identify each input item in your service
- allow you to reference or use user inputs in other places – for example, display a user’s answer back to them on a summary screen
- correspond to the HTML ‘name’ attribute
heading: IDs and input names
